annotations.description: The fans must be pleased with the show they have seen on the pitch today. There was no chance to get bored as the game was very attractive. Let's hope the players won't lose their passion and determination in the future matches. The hosts were largely in control of the game today. The home team tried to prevail using combination football unlike the away players who attempted to beat the opposition's defence using mostly counter attacks.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: That's it for today, William Collum has blown his whistle and the game is over.

Robert Lewandowski (Bayern Munich) rises above the opponent's defence and heads a precise cross towards the bottom left corner. The effort, however, is blocked by Andrij Pyatov, who pulls off a stunning save! The ball is out of play and the linesman points at the corner flag. Corner to Bayern Munich.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: There will be a minimum of 1 min. of added time.
Mario Gotze (Bayern Munich) gets a shot from inside the penalty area and it flies just wide of the left post.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Fantastic team goal! Mario Gotze (Bayern Munich) was set free in the area by Jerome Boateng and he made no mistake with a lovely finish into the bottom left corner. 7:0.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Darijo Srna (Shakhtar) takes the corner but fails to find any of his teammates. The ball is easily cleared out of danger.
Luiz Adriano (Shakhtar) attempts to send over a cross in order to find one of his teammates, but an opposition defender averts the danger by intercepting the effort. Shakhtar Donetsk win a corner.

annotations.label: attendance
annotations.description: The attendance for today's match is 70000.
Vyacheslav Shevchuk (Shakhtar) lashes the ball towards goal from outside the penalty area, but it goes narrowly over the crossbar.
Thomas Muller (Bayern Munich) misses a great chance! He latches on to a fine cross into the box, but his effort misses the right post by a whisker.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Douglas Costa goes off the pitch and Wellington Silva Sanches Agular (Shakhtar) comes on.
Rodrigues Fred (Shakhtar) attempts to surprise the keeper with a shot from distance, but it lacks more accuracy and it goes high over the crossbar.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal! Bastian Schweinsteiger puts a cross into the box and finds Robert Lewandowski (Bayern Munich), who latches on to it and strikes the ball into the bottom left corner. He makes it 6:0.

Luiz Adriano (Shakhtar) tries to find the head of a teammate in the box but overhits the cross. The ball is off of the pitch and it's a goal kick for Bayern Munich.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Holger Badstuber (Bayern Munich) latched on to a superb cross and knocked the ball past the goalkeeper with a fantastic header, bouncing in off the goalpost.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Mario Gotze (Bayern Munich) decides to take a short corner instead of crossing into the box.

Andrij Pyatov can hear the fans clapping for his superb goalkeeping after he magnificently stops the close range effort from Juan Bernat (Bayern Munich). The ball would have probably ended up in the bottom left corner. The ball goes behind for a corner. Bayern Munich will have an opportunity to threaten the opposition's goal.

annotations.label: substitution

Wow, what an escape. Luiz Adriano (Shakhtar) has an effort from inside the box but it's brilliantly blocked. The ball goes out of play and Shakhtar Donetsk have been awarded a corner kick.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal! The rebound fell to Thomas Muller (Bayern Munich) and he fired home from close range. The score is 4:0.

Darijo Srna (Shakhtar) is moving okay again after that injury scare.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal! David Alaba displays great vision and sends a pass to Franck Ribery (Bayern Munich), who shows brilliant composure inside the box to bury the ball into the bottom right corner. The score is 3:0.

Mario Gotze (Bayern Munich) releases a low pass from just outside the box in an attempt to find his teammate, but one of the defenders calmly averts the threat. The ball goes out for a corner. Bayern Munich can continue in their attacking effort.
William Collum blows his whistle and it's Sebastian Rode (Bayern Munich) who is penalised for an offensive foul. Good decision by the referee.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The second half gets underway.

There was plenty of entertainment during the first 45 minutes. Hopefully more of the same in the second half. The host team has dominated the game in almost all aspects so far and their opponents have struggled to keep up. The home team makes a lot of passes and attempts to maintain possession, while the visitors look to counter attack.
